metadata.h1: Our Privacy Policy (The Not-So-Boring Legal Stuff)
metadata.description: Here's the deal on how we handle your data. We take your privacy seriously! Read our full policy for all the deets on how we keep your info safe.
metadata.coreKeyword: Privacy Policy Olive Garden Menu Guide

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent:
The Lowdown on Privacy ü§´

Welcome to the Olive Garden Menu Guide! We're all about sharing our love for endless breadsticks, not your personal info. Your privacy is a BIG deal to us. This policy breaks down how we collect and protect your data when you hang out on our site.

Last updated: September 30, 2025

The Info We Collect üìù

Here's the tea on what we might collect:

  • Stuff You Give Us: This is any info you voluntarily share, like your name or email if you sign up for something cool (we don't have accounts right now, but maybe one day!).
  • Techy Stuff: When you visit, our servers automatically log some basic data like your IP address and browser type. This helps us see what's popular on the site and make it even better!

How We Use Your Info ü§ì

We use this info to make your experience here as awesome as possible. Think of it like this: knowing what pages are popular helps us create more of the content you love! We will NEVER sell your data. That's just not cool.

Got Questions? ü§î

If you have questions about any of this legal stuff, just shoot us an email! We're happy to chat. Contact us at: contact@olivegardenmenuguide.com
